Tribe.name: Tyo
Tribe.description: You are Tyo - and come from a part of Pepolis known as the Watching Cliffs, which overlooks one of the planet’s seas. Your tribe shapes Pepolis's weather by guiding the god Tyo’kuric, known as The Intense Storm

Tribe.name: Hijka
Tribe.description: You are Hijka - a nomadic tribe that follows and protects Hem’Kijka, a swarm of a thousand insects traveling across Pepolis and destroying invasive fauna or anything that might affect life on the planet.

Tribe.name: Skia
Tribe.description: You are Skia - a tribe of academics and scientists that reside on the mountain and M'Ekina known as Tkem'Skia, or The Voice of God. This is the name given to the giant ship of a forerunner species that is the source of much of the Pepel's early technological progress.

Tribe.name: Cu’Rr’Al
Tribe.description: You are Cu’Rr’Al - the tribe closest to the great spawning pools that bring the Pepel to life. Joyful and peaceful, your tribe worships the great M'Ekina Curannnallsi - the water spirit goddess that watches over the waters of Pepolis.

Tribe.name: Skro
Tribe.description: You are Skro - forest wanderers regarded as great harvesters and gatherers. Your worship the great M’Ekina Skrallw, the Life Giver. A sixteen-legged beast the size of a mountain that rolls over forests, plains and pastures and collecting any food it encounters. The Skro rely on it for sustenance.

Tribe.name: Mekt
Tribe.description: You are Mekt - a tribe shaped into formidable warriors by the relentless attacks of The Death God, M'Ekina Tkem’Mekt. Each time its agents were unleashed, the Mekt were forced to confront them. Their victories ultimately protected the Pepel species from eradication early in their evolution.

Tribe.name: Quanian
Tribe.description: You are Quanian - the only tribe not to serve a M'Ekina. Your tribe built the first city on Pepolis: Q'Ua - now the largest and most prosperous on the planet. It is home to the ruling authority on Pepolis: The Keepers of the Node. Without M'Ekina to worship, the Quanian cultivated their own belief system focused on improving the Pepelian species.

Origin.name: Aateos
Origin.description: Carved out of one of the many blocks that exist in the Outer Blocks, Aateos (Block 447,305) has become a massive city that shelters those who have a distaste for authority and the trivialities found in the Etherchain.

Origin.name: Central Block
Origin.description: A giant block drifting on the edge of Chainspace, constructed by a forerunner society dedicated to the study of the blocks, the blockworms, and the end of space. It is now a Temple and site of study and analysis.

Origin.name: Azshtttrokk, The Host
Origin.description: A city built and grown within the carcass of an ancient Blockworm and home to many of the Blockeater Tribes

Origin.name: Hued Forests
Origin.description: A lush landscape floating atop the Mempool, and littered with many waterways.

Origin.name: Deepmem
Origin.description: A region in the vast depths of the Mempool that is so deep as to transmute water into crystal.

Origin.name: Loclouds
Origin.description: The cloudy regions at the Mempool's outer bounds. Responsible for facilitating the Mempool's continual rejuvenation.

Origin.name: Genesis Cube
Origin.description: The vast construct whose explosion released the Genesis Pills and seeded the creation of all Chainspace.

Origin.name: Durn
Origin.description: A ship graveyard. A planet of scrap parts that has become the Etherchain's largest junkyard.

Origin.name: Pepolis
Origin.description: The swampy homeworld of the Pepel, a sentient frog-like species with advanced technology

Origin.name: Krolos
Origin.description: A peaceful world of learning, governed by A.I. some say are the descendants of the ancient Flashbots.

Origin.name: Topheilia
Origin.description: Home of the Topheil, an insectoid race that has taken to preserving life found across Chainspace. They have turned their world into a conservatory for life of all kinds, where they look after each of the creatures they’ve collected.

Origin.name: Lusk
Origin.description: Sitting within an asteroid belt, Lusk is the name given to a space station that was originally created to monitor the movements of the belt, but now serves as a cosmic court to the settling of disputes across Chainspace.

Upbringing.name: Space Traveler
Upbringing.description: You have grown as an interstellar nomad, traveling across Chainspace.

Upbringing.name: Rekker
Upbringing.description: Your ancestors were once rekt, their livelihoods destroyed. Now, you have nothing to lose, and have joined others like you to fight back against that system: taking what you can by force.

Upbringing.name: Bearbarian
Upbringing.description: You've honed a sentiment of doom and gloom into a powerful frenzy state, ready to be unleashed on the battlefield.

Upbringing.name: Doomskroler
Upbringing.description: You've trained with the Doomskroler Sekt, traveling across Chainspace to prophecize "The End"...or an end...any end will do.

Upbringing.name: Yield Farmer
Upbringing.description: You've grown up a yield farmer. Its a humble life, but you know it well.

Upbringing.name: Algorist
Upbringing.description: You've trained in the algorist arts, weaving algorithms together to produce incredible tapestries of light, sound, time and form.

Upbringing.name: Trader
Upbringing.description: Your life has been dedicated to the art of buying low and selling high as you trade goods across Chainspace.

Upbringing.name: Edgelord
Upbringing.description: Your are self-proclaimed nobility, living at the edges of the universe.

Upbringing.name: Operator
Upbringing.description: You're well trained operating vehicles: whether through space, on air, sea or land.

Upbringing.name: Patcher
Upbringing.description: You grew up amongst Patchers, a wandering mechanics traveling between worlds to construct and tend to the yield engines communities rely on to boost their farm's yields

Gift.name: Diamond Hands
Gift.description: Whether through genetics, or a lifetime of extreme training, you possess diamond hands, and the heightened fortitude that comes with it

Gift.name: Apeblood
Gift.description: The blood of apes flows through your veins, and their strength is your strength

Gift.name: Frontrunner
Gift.description: You possess a vast awareness of the flow of transactions across Chainspace, and the reflexes to beat them into blockspace.

Gift.name: Galaxy Brain
Gift.description: Your intellect is so vast as to either span across galaxies, or contain them

Gift.name: Gweibond
Gift.description: Your very essence is deeply bound to The Gwei, and you can perceive events in Chainspace just before they occur.

Gift.name: Simptongued
Gift.description: You have a way with words, though they don't always get you the desired result

Faction.name: None
Faction.description: You owe allegiance to no one, content to navigate your own way through Chainspace.

Faction.name: Aave
Faction.description: The Protectors. The Aave faction both inhabit and protect V'alta K'unta, otherwise known as the Ghostlands, an odd reality fermenting in the belly of an ancient memwraith.

Faction.name: Alchemix
Faction.description: The Cloners. Alchemix deals in all sorts of trade and services, but their main source of income comes through cloning. They offer the people of Chainspace loans in return for an exact clone that can serve them until the debt is paid off.

Faction.name: Badger
Faction.description: The Smugglers. Badger deals in smuggling things across the Great Expanse by using their bridges, this includes the fractured pieces of Gods. Right now, the efforts of Badger are focussed on smuggling the fractured remains of the bitcoin godchain into the Etherchain

Faction.name: Uniswap
Faction.description: The Tinkerers. Stalwart followers of the Unigod, the agents of Uniswap believe that a balance must be maintained between centralization and decentralization, and that only through the guidance of the Unigod, such a thing is achievable.

Faction.name: Sushi
Faction.description: The Alchemists. Sushi believes that a single entity, like the Unigod, should not be responsible for the decentralization of Chainspace. Instead, unlike their rivals Uniswap, they believe the Unigod's mission and power should be distributed, accessible, and available to anyone who feels a calling for decentralization.

Faction.name: Temple
Faction.description: The Builders. Block by block they construct a Temple that is the size of a planet. A temple that will surely take thousands of years to complete, but will be a beacon to their mantra of "Stake & Chill".

Faction.name: Olympus
Faction.description: The Wayfarers. They of the Formless Mountain who seek to achieve a way of transcendence by collectively embodying a pure-state stability, which has long been thought of as impossible. Their metaphysical journey takes the members through a series of ranks, from "1,1" to "3,3" and to "9,9" beyond.

Faction.name: Yearn
Faction.description: The Patchers. Founded by the enigmatic patcher, Andre, Yearn pledges itself to the teachings and wisdom of the four yFus; Techne, Community, Transmission, and Dominion, and, of course, the Yearning Tree that created them. They traverse Chainspace, repairing the ancient yield tech relied on by communities for bountiful harvests.

Faction.name: Degenerators
Faction.description: The Criminals. A coalition of criminal clans - pirates, smugglers, cyphers and other riff raff, bound together for mutual protection across Chainspace's Outer Blocks.

Faction.name: Shadowpakt
Faction.description: The Destroyers. Agents of the Shadowchain, guided to do its bidding and achieve its aim of swallowing all Chainspace.

Faction.name: RATStribe
Faction.description: The Artists. Members of the RATStribe reject the overt commercialization of artistic practices, structuring their community around the mutual gifting of their creative expression.

Water Type.name: Coral
Water Type.description: You are made from the waters that ebb and flow through the coral regions, close to the Mempool's island archipelagos

Water Type.name: Sunstrider
Water Type.description: You are made from the sunkissed waterways that flow within the Mempool's islands

Water Type.name: Arctic
Water Type.description: You are made from the frigid waters at the Mempool's fringes.

Water Type.name: Tropic
Water Type.description: You are made from the warm waters that flow near the Mempool's center

Water Type.name: Shadowmarked
Water Type.description: Your are made from ashen waters corrupted by the Shadowchain's touch.

Mouth.name: Smiling
Mouth.description: You're content with life, and it shows through your comfortable smile

Mouth.name: Grinner
Mouth.description: Your toothy grin suggests you're generally happy in life

Mouth.name: Grinch
Mouth.description: Your mouth is warped into a crooked and sly grin, as though you possess a devilish plan you can't keep to yourself

Mouth.name: Flytrap
Mouth.description: You prefer to keep your tongue in prime position for a quick meal

Mouth.name: Frownfrog
Mouth.description: Whenever you look at a swamp, it appears half empty, and this dour perspective manifests itself in a seemingly permafrown

Mouth.name: Sharptooth
Mouth.description: You must have descended from ancestors who were avid flesh eaters.

Mouth.name: Frogseers
Mouth.description: Frogseers have taken up home in your mouth. Their psychoactive skin grants you extrasensory perception

Mouth.name: Squidmouth
Mouth.description: Whether through some ancient sorcery, or an advanced technology, this Pepel has been transformed into...something else

Mouth.name: Rainbow Gemtooth
Mouth.description: You've paid a small town jeweller to outfit your mouth with with whatever gems they had lying around.

Mouth.name: Diamondtooth
Mouth.description: You've paid a small fortune to outfit your mouth with polished diamond teeth, and you grin incessantly so everybody knows it.

Mouth.name: Mutemouth
Mouth.description: Whether through incessant shilling, offering up terrible takes, or some other transgression it was decided that you should adopt The Mutemouth Path. A comfortable silence now surrounds you, to everyone's quiet joy.

Mouth.name: Tusker Alpha
Mouth.description: You were Pepel, once, but somewhere in your ancestral tree, you diverged. You're a Tusker now, of the Alpha clan.

Mouth.name: Tusker Gitzker
Mouth.description: You were Pepel, once, but somewhere in your ancestral tree, you diverged. You're a Tusker now, of the Gitzker clan.

Mouth.name: Tusker Thrasher
Mouth.description: You were Pepel, once, but somewhere in your ancestral tree, you diverged. You're a Tusker now, of the Thrasher clan.

Mouth.name: Tusker Piercer
Mouth.description: You were Pepel, once, but somewhere in your ancestral tree, you diverged. You're a Tusker now, of the Piercer clan.

Mouth.name: Moonmanic's Mouth
Mouth.description: This Pepel's moonmania has extended to its mouth

Mouth.name: Moonmanic's Drooling Mouth
Mouth.description: This Pepel's advanced moonmania has extended to its mouth causing it to drool incessantly

Mouth.name: The Prophet's Maw
Mouth.description: You have sacrificed a pill to one of the Great Old 0xmons, and they have remade you in their image as a reward

Eyes.name: Pepelian Eye
Eyes.description: An average Pepelian eye. In all its glory.

Eyes.name: Third Eye
Eyes.description: Your muscular intellect has somehow gifted you with a Third Eye.

Eyes.name: Third Eye, Awakened
Eyes.description:
Your muscular intellect has somehow gifted you with a Third Eye, and now, somehow it has awakened. 

It seems to have a mind of its own. Sometimes it speaks to you in a flash of incoherent visions. Their origin is a mystery.

Eyes.name: Hypnotoad
Eyes.description: You wield a potent hypnotic ability capable of influencing those around you. Some receive this gift at birth. Others cultivate it through intense training and dedication.

Eyes.name: Radiant
Eyes.description: Your have evolved to see beyond the normal visual spectrum. The nauseating neon green that tints your sight lets you perceive the imperceptible

Eyes.name: Inkblack
Eyes.description: Your featureless eyes are black as night. Some find comfort in them, others see the void

Eyes.name: Swirling
Eyes.description: Your eyes are known for their almost hypnotic swirling pattern

Eyes.name: Ghostglass
Eyes.description: Your eyes possess a distinctive pattern, undoubtedly inherited from your ancient ancestors

Eyes.name: Blindbound
Eyes.description: You close your eyes, and they remain shut. You have dedicated yourself to sensory deprivation in a search for deeper truths. You are Blindbound.

Eyes.name: Burning Eyes
Eyes.description: The 0x00 sees through you.

Eyes.name: Goldeyed
Eyes.description: You paid a local artisan to adorn your eyes with intricate linework inspired by an ancient Pepelian art style

Eyes.name: The Heart's Eye
Eyes.description: Your eyes possess a deep red hue, similar to a Pepelian heart.

Eyes.name: Rippleyed
Eyes.description: Your eyes possess rings of concentric circles, as if rippling out from your pupil

Eyes.name: Loomsight
Eyes.description: The Pepelian skin condition known as Loompox has colonized your eyes. Your vision is now filtered through these strange sentient creatures.. probably not for the better

Eyes.name: Frogsage
Eyes.description: Eyes that commonly emerge amongst those with a gift for soothsaying, or perceiving possible futures

Eyes.name: Eye of the Guardian, Type 1
Eyes.description: Your eyes depict one of the hieroglyphic symbols that adorned the Genesis Cube... You are unsure of the implications..

Eyes.name: Eye of the Guardian, Type 2
Eyes.description: Your eyes depict one of the hieroglyphic symbols that adorned the Genesis Cube... You are unsure of the implications..

Eyes.name: Eye of the Guardian, Type 3
Eyes.description: Your eyes depict one of the hieroglyphic symbols that adorned the Genesis Cube... You are unsure of the implications..

Eyes.name: Eye of the Guardian, Type 4
Eyes.description: Your eyes depict one of the hieroglyphic symbols that adorned the Genesis Cube... You are unsure of the implications..

Eyes.name: Eye of the Guardian, Type 5
Eyes.description: Your eyes depict one of the hieroglyphic symbols that adorned the Genesis Cube... You are unsure of the implications..

Eyes.name: Moonmanic's Eye
Eyes.description: This Pepel's moonmania has extended to its eyes

Marking.name: Unmarked
Marking.description: Your skin is free of markings, tattoos and other embellishments

Marking.name: M'Ekina Tyo Facepaint
Marking.description: Your face is painted in reverence to the Tyo’kuric, The Intense Storm

Marking.name: M'Ekina Skia Facepaint
Marking.description: Your face is painted in reverence to Tkem'Skia, The Voice of God

Marking.name: M'Ekina Hijka Facepaint
Marking.description: Your face is painted in reverence to Hem’Kijka, The Swarm

Marking.name: M'Ekina Skro Facepaint
Marking.description: Your face is painted in reverence to Skrallw, the Life Giver

Marking.name: Scrambler Camo Alpha
Marking.description: You've marked your face with patterns designed to confuse simple synthetic vision systems, helping you evade detection

Marking.name: Scrambler Camo Beta
Marking.description: You've marked your face with patterns designed to confuse simple synthetic vision systems, helping you evade detection

Marking.name: Scrambler Camo Gamma
Marking.description: You've marked your face with patterns designed to confuse simple synthetic vision systems, helping you evade detection

Marking.name: Scrambler Camo Delta
Marking.description: You've marked your face with patterns designed to confuse simple synthetic vision systems, helping you evade detection

Marking.name: Jokeira Facepaint
Marking.description: You've adorned the Jokeira across your face in an attempt to imbue its spirit within you

Marking.name: Mishmash
Marking.description: You began adorning your body with ink from a young age and have ended up with an eclectic mix of markings that seem to say both a lot, and a little.

Marking.name: Pierced Nipples
Marking.description: A proud display of your individuality and aesthetic preferences

Marking.name: Skull Tattoo
Marking.description: A display of defiance in the face of death?  A warning to your enemies? A mark of teenage rebellion? Either way, it suits you.

Marking.name: Jokeira Tattoo
Marking.description: The Jokeira smiles loudly across your stomach, orbited by the Twin Moods

Marking.name: Fidenza Tattoo
Marking.description: You could never afford a real one, but this tattoo is close enough.

Marking.name: Mark of the Oracle
Marking.description: You've adorned the Mark of the Oracle across your belly, as you seek its favor

Marking.name: Stripeskinned
Marking.description: You were born with distinctive stripes across your body

Marking.name: Memburned
Marking.description: You're Memburned, and the distinctive pink patterning is emblazoned across your body. Was it from a failed memburn manoeuvre? Or overexposure to the Mempool's toxicity?

Marking.name: Leopardskinned
Marking.description: You must be descended from the  Leopardfrogs. For their distinctive markings adorn your body.

Marking.name: Moonmania
Marking.description: You've become afflicted with moonmania. Your obsession manifests itself in across your face via patterns of bright green bars

Marking.name: Loompox
Marking.description: A Pepel skin condition resulting in the blooming of a horde of sentient, blueberry-shaped creatures

Marking.name: The Etherchain Shatters
Marking.description: Prophetic markings adorn your body, heralding an inevitability: One day, the Etherchain will shatter

Marking.name: The Mempool Runs Dry
Marking.description: Prophetic markings adorn your body, heralding an inevitability: One day, the Mempool will run dry

Marking.name: The Shadowchain Awakens
Marking.description: Prophetic markings adorn your body, heralding an inevitability: One day, the Shadowchain will awaken

Marking.name: The Guardian Returns
Marking.description: Prophetic markings adorn your body, heralding an inevitability: One day, the Guardian will return

Marking.name: The Regenesis Begins
Marking.description: Prophetic markings adorn your body, heralding an inevitability: One day, the Regenesis will begin

Marking.name: Genesismarked
Marking.description: Enchanted fragments from the Genesis Cube adorn your skin. How, or why is a mystery. All you know is that the source of Chainspace's creation adorn your body. And you feel their murmuring in your bones.

Marking.name: Gremplin's Dagger
Marking.description: The famous blade of the mythical Pepelian hero that led 10,000 toadz to freedom

Marking.name: Graphe's Umber
Marking.description: You have sought out the legendary Pepelian artist Graphe, and they have adorned your body in their signature style

Hashmonk Torso.name: Rockpool
Hashmonk Torso.description: A waterform fashioned from the waters in and around Rockpools

Hashmonk Torso.name: Earthcrusher
Hashmonk Torso.description: A waterform fashioned from a mix of ocean and rock into a strong and resilient body

Hashmonk Torso.name: Tidalwisp
Hashmonk Torso.description: A waterform fashioned from the wisps of water that fly across the Mempool's surface

Hashmonk Torso.name: Genesistorso Core
Hashmonk Torso.description: You are made from the reforged fragments of the Genesis Cube, the ancient relic whose destruction gave created Chainspace. You must be nearly as ancient as the Cube itself and regularly receive the reverence of those you encounter.

Hashmonk Torso.name: Tsuno
Hashmonk Torso.description: A waterform fashioned from the enormous waves that occasionally emerge from the Mempool's depths

Hashmonk Crown.name: Memricrown
Hashmonk Crown.description: An artifact of significance, grown into being from the corals in the Mempool. Bestowed upon Hashmonks who dedicate lifetimes to cultivating Memricorns.

Hashmonk Crown.name: None
Hashmonk Crown.description: You have not yet earned a crown

Hashmonk Head.name: Etherkraken
Hashmonk Head.description: A creature from the depths of the Deepmem has colonized your head. You and it are one.

Hashmonk Head.name: Cyclops Shadowleech
Hashmonk Head.description: This twisted parasite has sunk its fangs into you. You and it are now one and the same. The whispers of the Shadowchain radiate throughout your corrupted body

Hashmonk Head.name: Rockpool
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform fashioned from the waters in and around Rockpools

Hashmonk Head.name: Earthcrusher
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform fashioned from a mix of ocean and rock into a strong and resilient body

Hashmonk Head.name: Waxing Tidalhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform head fashioned in tribute to the tidal moods of the Mempool. This one depicts the Waxing Tide

Hashmonk Head.name: Waning Tidalhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform head fashioned in tribute to the tidal moods of the Mempool. This one depicts the Waning Tide

Hashmonk Head.name: Wading Tidalhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform head fashioned in tribute to the tidal moods of the Mempool. This one depicts the Wading Tide

Hashmonk Head.name: Wandering Tidalhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform head fashioned in tribute to the tidal moods of the Mempool. This one depicts the Wandering Tide

Hashmonk Head.name: Wondrous Tidalhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform head fashioned in tribute to the tidal moods of the Mempool. This one depicts the Wondrous Tide

Hashmonk Head.name: Warring Tidalhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform head fashioned in tribute to the tidal moods of the Mempool. This one depicts the Warring Tide

Hashmonk Head.name: Wistful Tidalhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform head fashioned in tribute to the tidal moods of the Mempool. This one depicts the Wistful Tide

Hashmonk Head.name: Wrathful Tidalhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A waterform head fashioned in tribute to the tidal moods of the Mempool. This one depicts the Wrathful Tide

Hashmonk Head.name: Melted Mirrorpillhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A Hashmonk has come into contact with this Mirrorpill and perceived incomprehensible realities that have melted its mind in the process

Hashmonk Head.name: Flawless Quad Eye Guardianhead
Hashmonk Head.description: A head made from the ancient matter of the Genesis Cube and depicting The Guardian: the mysterious, metaphysical entity that watched over the Cube until its eventual destruction

Hashmonk Left Arm.name: Rockpool
Hashmonk Left Arm.description: A waterform fashioned from the waters in and around Rockpools

Hashmonk Left Arm.name: Earthcrusher
Hashmonk Left Arm.description: A waterform fashioned from a mix of ocean and rock into a strong and resilient body

Hashmonk Left Arm.name: Tidalwisp
Hashmonk Left Arm.description: A waterform fashioned from the wisps of water that fly across the Mempool's surface

Hashmonk Left Arm.name: Tsuno
Hashmonk Left Arm.description: A waterform fashioned from the enormous waves that occasionally emerge from the Mempool's depths

Hashmonk Left Leg.name: Rockpool
Hashmonk Left Leg.description: A waterform fashioned from the waters in and around Rockpools

Hashmonk Left Leg.name: Earthcrusher
Hashmonk Left Leg.description: A waterform fashioned from a mix of ocean and rock into a strong and resilient body

Hashmonk Left Leg.name: Tsuno
Hashmonk Left Leg.description: A waterform fashioned from the enormous waves that occasionally emerge from the Mempool's depths

Hashmonk Left Leg.name: Tidalwisp
Hashmonk Left Leg.description: A waterform fashioned from the wisps of water that fly across the Mempool's surface

Hashmonk Mask.name: Hashmask
Hashmonk Mask.description: The familiar face of the Hashmonks. A simple mask that speaks to the Hashmonks humble role in the Mempool ecosystem. Every Hashmonk has worn the Hashmask at least once. Some continue to wear it.

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Dreamer
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask shaped in the image of The Dreamer, an ancient, antediluvian archetype

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Thinker
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask shaped in the image of The Thinker, an ancient, antediluvian archetype

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Inquisitor
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask shaped in the image of The Inquisitor, an ancient, antediluvian archetype

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Observer
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask shaped in the image of The Observer, an ancient, antediluvian archetype

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Sage
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask shaped in the image of The Sage, an ancient, antediluvian archetype

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Seer
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask shaped in the image of The Seer, an ancient, antediluvian archetype

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Jester
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask shaped in the image of The Jester, an ancient, antediluvian archetype

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Arbiter
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask shaped in the image of The Arbiter, an ancient, antediluvian archetype

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Unconscious
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask shaped in the image of The Unconscious, an ancient, antediluvian archetype

Hashmonk Mask.name: Faceless Crystalform
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the crystalline nature of the Deepmem

Hashmonk Mask.name: Faceless Flowerform
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the flowers of the Mempool

Hashmonk Mask.name: Faceless Featherform
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the creatures of the Loclouds within the Mempool

Hashmonk Mask.name: Faceless Rippleform
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the rippling reflections of the Mempool

Hashmonk Mask.name: Faceless Fernform
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the plantlife at the edges of the Mempool's waterways

Hashmonk Mask.name: Faceless Aquaform
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the sea life within the Mempool

Hashmonk Mask.name: Faceless Spiralform
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the cyclical currents of the Mempool

Hashmonk Mask.name: Faceless Supraform
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to fundamental shapes and forms

Hashmonk Mask.name: Unipattern Flower
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting the flowerforms that grow upon the Unigod

Hashmonk Mask.name: Unipattern Mirror
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting the mirrorforms that grow upon the Unigod

Hashmonk Mask.name: Unipattern Trident
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting the trident that grow upon the Unigod

Hashmonk Mask.name: Unipattern Starburst
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting the starbursts that grow upon the Unigod

Hashmonk Mask.name: The Drowned One
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting a Crystalform Hashmonk that grew so large that it sunk to the darkest depths of the Deepmem, where it lies to this day.

Hashmonk Mask.name: AVA-00
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask fashioned from a piece of scrap found in Durn

Hashmonk Mask.name: Golden Visor
Hashmonk Mask.description: An ornamental mask you commissioned from a specific craftsman inhabiting a remote area of the Loclouds

Hashmonk Mask.name: Mask of the Anemone
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the anemone of the Mempool

Hashmonk Mask.name: Mask of the Abstract
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting the hidden meaning of abstract forms

Hashmonk Mask.name: Mask of the Fox
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask celebrating an unfamiliar creature encountered in another reality

Hashmonk Mask.name: Mask of the Trickster
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask dedicated to the essential role of the Trickster

Hashmonk Mask.name: Mask of the Wolf
Hashmonk Mask.description: A strange mask from another reality.

Hashmonk Mask.name: Nullface
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting the shapeshifting Nullform creatures of the Nullwastes.

Hashmonk Mask.name: Mask of the Pillgod
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the Pillgod, the deity at the heart of the Genesis Cube

Hashmonk Mask.name: Active Portalmask
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting a Memfruit producing an active portal

Hashmonk Mask.name: Dormant Portalmask
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting a dormant Memfruit

Hashmonk Mask.name: Blooming Portalmask
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting a blooming Memfruit

Hashmonk Mask.name: Fruiting Portalmask
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting a  Memfruit in full bloom

Hashmonk Mask.name: Crowned Portalmask
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask depicting a Memfruit Queen's crown

Hashmonk Mask.name: Mask of the Unigod
Hashmonk Mask.description: A mask devoted to the Unigod and depicting the Unigod's eye.

Hashmonk Mask.name: Memsnake Mask
Hashmonk Mask.description: A ceremonial mask depicting the Memsnake's of the Mempool

Hashmonk Mask.name: Tubbymask
Hashmonk Mask.description: Your mask is an ode to Tubbycats everywhere

Hashmonk Right Arm.name: Rockpool
Hashmonk Right Arm.description: A waterform fashioned from the waters in and around Rockpools

Hashmonk Right Arm.name: Earthcrusher
Hashmonk Right Arm.description: A waterform fashioned from a mix of ocean and rock into a strong and resilient body

Hashmonk Right Arm.name: Tidalwisp
Hashmonk Right Arm.description: A waterform fashioned from the wisps of water that fly across the Mempool's surface

Hashmonk Right Arm.name: Tsuno
Hashmonk Right Arm.description: A waterform fashioned from the enormous waves that occasionally emerge from the Mempool's depths

Hashmonk Right Arm.name: Fangfish (Arm)
Hashmonk Right Arm.description: This parasitic creature from the inkwells in the Shadowchain has chosen you as its host. You now possess its power and abilities.

Hashmonk Right Leg.name: Rockpool
Hashmonk Right Leg.description: A waterform fashioned from the waters in and around Rockpools

Hashmonk Right Leg.name: Earthcrusher
Hashmonk Right Leg.description: A waterform fashioned from a mix of ocean and rock into a strong and resilient body

Hashmonk Right Leg.name: Tidalwisp
Hashmonk Right Leg.description: A waterform fashioned from the wisps of water that fly across the Mempool's surface

Hashmonk Right Leg.name: Tsuno
Hashmonk Right Leg.description: A waterform fashioned from the enormous waves that occasionally emerge from the Mempool's depths
